sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {HeaderLogo,StyledWrapper,LogoLink,Options,OptionsLink,SignOutLink} from './styles'

import {auth} from '../../firebase/firebase.utils'

import CartDropDownContainer from '../cartDropdown/cartDropDownContainer';
import CartIconContainer from '../cartIcon/cartIconContainer';

const Header = ({currentUser,hidden}) => {
  return (
    <StyledWrapper>
        <LogoLink to="/">
            <HeaderLogo />
        </LogoLink>
        <Options>
            <OptionsLink to="/sklep">
                SKLEP
            </OptionsLink>
            <OptionsLink to="/kontakt">
                KONTAKT
            </OptionsLink>
            {
                currentUser 
                ? 
                <SignOutLink onClick={() => auth.signOut()}>SIGN OUT</SignOutLink>
                :
                <OptionsLink to="/signin">
                    SIGN IN
                </OptionsLink>
            }
            <CartIconContainer/>
        </Options>
        {hidden ? null : <CartDropDownContainer/> }
        
    </StyledWrapper>
  )
}




export default Header
